articles.title: The Patriots didn’t finish the way their 2001 ancestors did. Let’s hope they don’t produce a similar follow-up season, either.

articles.title: Gold medalist Breezy Johnson’s latest Olympic bling? A sapphire engagement ring.
articles.description:

articles.title: Jaylen Brown offers Drake Maye advice on how to ‘level up’ after  championship heartbreak

articles.title: Malinin made history with his Olympic backflip, but some say the glory was owed to a Black skater
articles.description:
